EmailTemplate.name: ST Last Mile - Attempted delivery
EmailTemplate.subject: Good news! We've located your delivery on case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery will soon be ready to collect
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are delighted to see that it has now been located and has had an attempted delivery today.
You’ll have received a card or a digital notification with next steps, and you can use our missed delivery tool to explore your options.
Your case will be closed now that your delivery is almost there.
StarTrack
This email was sent by Startrack. Startrack does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
